channel.title: General Chicago Weekend Clubbing Nightlife on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Chicago Weekend Clubbing Nightlife on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: this weekend. it is now cold out. and i am wearing shorts.
item.description: I am freezing. Seriously. It suddenly got like 100 below zero up in this piece. But never fear. i have a coat. and i will where it when i go outside. Which doesn’t help me while i am cold here in my living room. hah. last night or maybe it was the previous night - i was ready for snow. but now that it is colder than it was, i am not ready for snow.
